artist: Printer: After Thomas Worlidge; Engraver: Thomas A. E. Chambars
description: portrait of Thomas Worledge, half length; wearing fur trimmed gown and cap; etching a plate from a bust of Cicero; looking at viewer; seated at table with easel behind holding a portrait of a woman
inscription:

title: Thomas Worledge
